pkgmetadata.longdescription:
cpupower-gui is a Python GTK+ 3 frontend for CPU frequency scaling.
It may require a sudo to change settings.
Per-package environmental variables for systemd users:
CPUPOWER_GUI_SYSTEMD_SYSTEM_DIR - the systemd directory (default: /usr/lib/systemd)

use.flag: When on - places .pkla files in /var/lib/polkit-1/localauthority/10-vendor.d/. When off (default) - places .pkla files in /usr/share/polkit-1/rules.d/.
When on - the dbus helper program is installed in /usr/libexec. When off (default) - the dbus helper program is installed in /usr/lib/.
